oai_dc:dc.dc:description: k g ra and !haunu, who fought each other with lightning. By /han kass o (L VIII.
8648). See|han kass'o's grandmothers used to tell him that kagara was fighting with !haunu in the east when the weather thundered and when the clouds resembled mountains and were thick.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: kagara's fight with !haunu in the east
